/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -g  -shared -Wl,-soname,libossimndf_plugin.so -o ../../lib/libossimndf_plugin.so CMakeFiles/ossimndf_plugin.dir/ossimNdfPluginInit.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ossimndf_plugin.dir/ndf_test.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ossimndf_plugin.dir/ossimNdfReaderFactory.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ossimndf_plugin.dir/ossimNdfTileSource.cpp.o CMakeFiles/ossimndf_plugin.dir/ossimNdfHeader.cpp.o -L/usr/lib64/openmpi/lib ../../lib/libossim.so.1.8.12 -lOpenThreads -ltiff -ljpeg -ltiff -lgeotiff -lOpenThreads -lfreetype -lmpi -lz -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/vipul/ossim-svn/src/ossim_package_support/cmake/build/lib:/usr/lib64/openmpi/lib:
